text: Bierné is a former commune of 665 people (2005). It is found in the Pays de la Loire region in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Bierné-les-Villages.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Bierné
